## DMC2010 Exploratory Visual Analytics

```{r eval=F}
rCharts::open_notebook()
```

```{r echo=T, message=F, cache=F}
library(rCharts)
library(xtable)
library(psych)

options(RCHART_WIDTH=600, RCHART_HEIGHT=400)
opts_knit$set(root.dir="..")

colnames.oftype <- function(x, type) colnames(x[sapply(dt, type)])
```
<style>.rChart {width: 600px; height: 400px;}</style>
```{r echo=F}
source("R/pp.R")
```

Find all numeric attributes and do some descriptive statistics

```{r echo=T, results="asis"}
print(xtable(psych::describe(dt[colnames.oftype(dt, is.numeric)])), type="html")
```

```{r factors, comments=NA, results="asis"}
# Merge Test an Train Data into a Data Frame
dt.test$target90 <- NA
cmb <- rbind(data.frame(dt, group="train"), data.frame(dt.test, group="test"))

n <- nPlot(Freq ~ Var1, data.frame(table(dt$target90)))
n$show("inline", include_assets=T, cdn=T)
```
